form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AMERICAN CONSULATE GENERAL HONG KONG, HNK-8 7-1-62

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 HNK-8 7-1-62 AMERICAN CONSULATE GENERAL HONG KONG 12/6/73 (Date) Examining Physician: It is requested that the persons described below and whose photographs are affixed to this sheet under the seal of the Consulate General, be blood tested for paternity groupings, The fees charged for the examination are to be paid by the persons submitting to the tests. Donald D. Casteel American Consul American Consul TANG Man B324018 Name: Height: Relationship: f/o petr. Weight: A: B: M: N: + + + rh'(C): Rho(D): + rh"(E): 0 hr'(c): 0 Name: Height: Relationship: Weight: A: B: M: N: rh'(C): Rho(D): rh"(E): hr'(c): Name: Height: Relationship: Weight: A: B: M: N: rh'(C): Rho(D): rh"(E): hr'(c): Do not write in this space. CERTIFICATION 12d DEC 1973 COMPATIBLE (Date) Tang Man (father) B MN R1R7 I certify that on this date I Have examined Patricia Pik Ling Yee blood specimens of the persons described above. The (dtr) o MN R1R1 results of those examinations as recorded above have been verified and are correct. Examining Physician Dr. J. F. Mackay. M.R.C.P. (G) Drs. Anderson & Partners 233, Prince's Building Hong Kong
